en.firefox_description: This add-on will add a small icon in the right side of your address bar. If you are browsing a website that is not in our database, nothing will appear. Click on the icon to get the summary of the terms, provided by ToS;DR.
en.chrome_description: This extension will add a small icon in the right side of your address bar. If you are browsing a website that is not in our database, nothing will appear. Click on the icon to get the summary of the terms, provided by ToS;DR. When you land on a website with very bad terms, a small notification will pop up in the bottom right hand corner to warn you.
en.safari_description: This extension will add a small icon just next to the address bar, on the left. If you are browsing a website that is not in our database, nothing will appear. Click on the icon to get the summary of the terms, provided by ToS;DR.
en.edge_description: This extension will add a small icon just next to the address bar, on the left. If you are browsing a website that is not in our database, nothing will appear. Click on the icon to get the summary of the terms, provided by ToS;DR.
en.opera_description: This extension will add a small icon on the top right-hand corner. If you are browsing a website that is not in our database, nothing will appear. Click on the icon to get the summary of the terms, provided by ToS;DR.
